content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed upon price was [675] Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am satisfied with the outcome. However, as the perspective of the landlord Peter Schmidt, I did not provide a numerical value on the satisfaction scale.
name: Peter Schmidt
